english.segment1: Three nails gave me life. May I ask this simple question, where do you belong?. Where is your destiny? Where is your identity?. Im not here to demonstrate my style. I dont want to persuade. Im not here to represent my crew, cause there are so many styles.
english.segment2: Our void, our void, our void cannot be filled. Your life, your life, your life dont throw it away.
english.segment3: Correct me if Im wrong, dont we all want our respect?. Who doesnt want to be loved? Who doesnt want to be loved?. Im not here to demonstrate my style..
english.segment4: Our void, our void,Your life, your life,
english.segment5: This is what we're looking for, this is what were searching for, its about unconditional love. Three nails gave me life.
